abstract.p: Correction: Apr 26 article on corporate annual reports referred incorrectly to operations of Tenneco, one of companies cited; company focuses on auto parts and packaging; category of Tenneco's revenue that nearly doubled in recent years was from continuing operations, not over-all revenue0

block.p: An article on April 26 about the themes of corporate annual reports referred incompletely to the operations of Tenneco, one of the companies cited. Along with auto parts, the company focuses on packaging.
The article also misstated the category of Tenneco's revenue that nearly doubled from 1993 to 1997. It was from continuing operations, not overall revenue.

An article on April 26 about the themes of corporate annual reports referred incompletely to the operations of Tenneco, one of the companies cited. Along with auto parts, the company focuses on packaging.
The article also misstated the category of Tenneco's revenue that nearly doubled from 1993 to 1997. It was from continuing operations, not overall revenue.
